Plot a distance map using a diverging color scale with white at 0

Plot a distance map using a diverging color scale with white at 0

plot_diverging(im, title, show_boundary = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

im

A pixel image of class im.
title

Title for the plot.
show_boundary

Should the boundary be highlighted?
...

Additional arguments passed to plot.im
